Bank Accounts∵

A BankAccount is a funding instrument resource that represents a bank account. Bank account information is securely vaulted is referenced by a href. A BankAccount may be created multiple times, each BankAccount represented by a unique href. Each BankAccount may be associated one time only and to only one Customer. Once associated, a Card may not be disassociated from the Customer, it may only be unstored.


Available Query Filters
created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

is_valid

Available Operations: =, !=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: False

meta

Available Operations: contains, !contains

Default Operation: contains

Sortable: False

note
To debit a bank account you must first verify it.

Create a Bank Account (Direct)∵

Creates a new BankAccount resource that represents a bank account funding instrument.

note
This method is not recommended for production environments. Please use balanced.js for creating bank accounts.
account_number
required string. Masked account number.
account_type
required string. checking or savings.
name
required string. Name of the account holder.
routing_number
required string. Routing number format. Specified in FedACH database defined by the US Federal Reserve.
address

optional object.

city
optional string. City of the person or business.
line2
optional string. Second line of the address for the person or business.
line1
optional string. Street address of the person or business.
state
optional string. State of the person or business.
postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
country_code
optional string. Two character country code.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts

Balanced::BankAccount.new

balanced.BankAccount().save()

balanced.marketplace.bank_accounts.create()

BankAccount(Map<String, Object> payload)

\Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->bank_accounts->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "routing_number=121000358" \
     -d "account_type=checking" \
     -d "name=Johann Bernoulli" \
     -d "account_number=9900000001"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.new(
  :account_number => '9900000001',
  :account_type => 'checking',
  :name => 'Johann Bernoulli',
  :routing_number => '121000358'
).save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount(
  routing_number='121000358',
  account_type='checking',
  account_number='9900000001',
  name='Johann Bernoulli'
).save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.bank_accounts.create({
    "routing_number": "121000358", 
    "account_type": "checking", 
    "name": "Johann Bernoulli", 
    "account_number": "9900000001"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("account_number", "9900000001");
payload.put("name", "Johann Bernoulli");
payload.put("routing_number", "121000358");
payload.put("account_type", "checking");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount(payload);
try {
    bankAccount.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = \Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$bank_account = $marketplace->bank_accounts->create(array(
    "account_number" => "9900000001",
    "name" => "Johann Bernoulli",
    "routing_number" => "121000358",
    "type" => "checking",
));

$bank_account->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "bank_accounts": [
        {
            "account_number": "xxxxxx0001", 
            "account_type": "checking", 
            "address": {
                "city": null, 
                "country_code": null, 
                "line1": null, 
                "line2": null, 
                "postal_code": null, 
                "state": null
            }, 
            "bank_name": "BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.", 
            "can_credit": true, 
            "can_debit": false, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:02.267607Z", 
            "fingerprint": "5f0ba9fa3f1122ef13b944a40abfe44e7eba9e16934e64200913cb4c402ace14", 
            "href": "/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO", 
            "id": "BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO", 
            "links": {
                "bank_account_verification": null, 
                "customer": null
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "name": "Johann Bernoulli", 
            "routing_number": "121000358", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:02.267611Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "bank_accounts.bank_account_verification": "/verifications/{bank_accounts.bank_account_verification}", 
        "bank_accounts.bank_account_verifications": "/bank_accounts/{bank_accounts.id}/verifications", 
        "bank_accounts.credits": "/bank_accounts/{bank_accounts.id}/credits", 
        "bank_accounts.customer": "/customers/{bank_accounts.customer}", 
        "bank_accounts.debits": "/bank_accounts/{bank_accounts.id}/debits"
    }
}

Fetch a Bank Account∵

Fetches the details of a previously created bank account.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id

Balanced::BankAccount.fetch

balanced.BankAccount.fetch()

balanced.get()

BankAccount(String uri)

Balanced\BankAccount::get

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6JeIzD7zM6rmp0Nt8Mu9Sw')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA58WYAEUMrEtAkW5KAvWo5V')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA3LBmizwthrjehivn2ffzHU");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/bank_accounts/BA2M6q0hqFsbnpPbPb7xeQo6");

?>

List Bank Accounts∵

Returns a list of bank accounts that you've created but haven't deleted.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts

Balanced::BankAccount.all

balanced.BankAccount.query

balanced.marketplace.bank_accounts

BankAccount.Collection(String uri)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->bank_accounts

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

Balanced::BankAccount.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_accounts = balanced.BankAccount.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.bank_accounts

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

BankAccount.Collection bankAccounts = new BankAccount.Collection(BankAccount.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$bank_accounts = $marketplace->bank_accounts->query()->all();

?>

Update a Bank Account∵

Update information in a card.

note
Once a bank account has been associated to a customer, it cannot be associated to another customer.
links
optional object.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id

Balanced::BankAccount.save

balanced.BankAccount().debit()

balanced.get().save()

BankAccount().save()

Balanced\BankAccount->save()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "meta[twitter.id]=1234987650" \
     -d "meta[facebook.user_id]=0192837465" \
     -d "meta[my-own-customer-id]=12345"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6JeIzD7zM6rmp0Nt8Mu9Sw')
bank_account.meta = {
  'facebook.user_id' => '0192837465',
  'my-own-customer-id' => '12345',
  'twitter.id' => '1234987650'
}
bank_account.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA58WYAEUMrEtAkW5KAvWo5V')
bank_account.meta = {
  'twitter.id'='1234987650',
  'facebook.user_id'='0192837465',
  'my-own-customer-id'='12345'
}
bank_account.save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO').then(function (bank_account) {
    bank_account.meta = {
        'user_id': '123123123'
    };
    bank_account.save()
});

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA3LBmizwthrjehivn2ffzHU");

Map<String, String> meta = new HashMap<String, String>();
meta.put("facebook.user_id", "0192837465");
meta.put("my-own-customer-id", "12345");
meta.put("twitter.id", "1234987650");

bankAccount.meta = meta;

try {
    bankAccount.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/bank_accounts/BA2M6q0hqFsbnpPbPb7xeQo6");
$bank_account->meta = array(
    "facebook.user_id" => "0192837465",
    "my-own-customer-id" => "12345",
    "twitter.id" => "1234987650",
);
$bank_account->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "bank_accounts": [
        {
            "account_number": "xxxxxx0001", 
            "account_type": "checking", 
            "address": {
                "city": null, 
                "country_code": null, 
                "line1": null, 
                "line2": null, 
                "postal_code": null, 
                "state": null
            }, 
            "bank_name": "BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.", 
            "can_credit": true, 
            "can_debit": false, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:02.267607Z", 
            "fingerprint": "5f0ba9fa3f1122ef13b944a40abfe44e7eba9e16934e64200913cb4c402ace14", 
            "href": "/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO", 
            "id": "BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO", 
            "links": {
                "bank_account_verification": null, 
                "customer": null
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "facebook.user_id": "0192837465", 
                "my-own-customer-id": "12345", 
                "twitter.id": "1234987650"
            }, 
            "name": "Johann Bernoulli", 
            "routing_number": "121000358", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:05.849938Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "bank_accounts.bank_account_verification": "/verifications/{bank_accounts.bank_account_verification}", 
        "bank_accounts.bank_account_verifications": "/bank_accounts/{bank_accounts.id}/verifications", 
        "bank_accounts.credits": "/bank_accounts/{bank_accounts.id}/credits", 
        "bank_accounts.customer": "/customers/{bank_accounts.customer}", 
        "bank_accounts.debits": "/bank_accounts/{bank_accounts.id}/debits"
    }
}

Delete a Bank Account∵

Permanently delete a bank account. It cannot be undone. All associated credits with a deleted bank account will not be affected.

Definition

DELETE https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id

Balanced::BankAccount.unstore

balanced.BankAccount().delete()

balanced.get().unstore()

BankAccount().unstore()

Balanced\BankAccount->unstore()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X DELETE

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6JeIzD7zM6rmp0Nt8Mu9Sw')
bank_account.unstore

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA58WYAEUMrEtAkW5KAvWo5V')
bank_account.delete()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/bank_accounts/BA48OG31AlNwmmTpC4hjosNO').unstore()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA3LBmizwthrjehivn2ffzHU");
try {
    bankAccount.unstore();
}
catch (APIError e) {}
catch (NotCreated e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/bank_accounts/BA2M6q0hqFsbnpPbPb7xeQo6");
$bank_account->unstore();

?>

Associate a Bank Account to a Customer∵

Add a BankAccount to a specific Customer. Multiple bank accounts may be associated to a customer.

note
Once a BankAccount has been associated to a Customer, it cannot be associated to another Customer.
account_number
required string. Masked account number.
account_type
required string. checking or savings.
name
required string. Name of the account holder.
routing_number
required string. Routing number format. Specified in FedACH database defined by the US Federal Reserve.
address

optional object.

city
optional string. City of the person or business.
line2
optional string. Second line of the address for the person or business.
line1
optional string. Street address of the person or business.
state
optional string. State of the person or business.
postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
country_code
optional string. Two character country code.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id

Balanced::BankAccount.associate_to_customer

balanced.Card().associate_to_customer()

balanced.get().associate_to_customer()

BankAccount().associateToCustomer(Customer customer)

Balanced\BankAccout->associateToCustomer()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0 \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "customer=/customers/CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch("/bank_accounts/BA6S1rsNWTCwBugJqjBNQbJU")
bank_account.associate_to_customer("/customers/CU6Puxkmu24SfVbY0oi1fPLw")

card.associate_to_customer('/customers/CU64R7DS6DwuXYVg9RTskFK8')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

Customer customer = new Customer("/customers/CU4EeI9UPzRcOo2C3j1qFjQj");
BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA4JCiiAb4alhWMlZSv9POAU");

bankAccount.associateToCustomer(customer);

Debit a Bank Account∵

Debit a bank account.

note
A bank account must be verified with micro deposits before it can be debited. See Bank Account Verifications.
amount
optional integer. The amount of the debit in cents.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~=\'" ^`|)

Any other characters will be rejected. Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

description
optional string. Free-text description of the debit for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.
order
optional string. The order this debit is associated with
source
optional string. The funding instrument debited

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/debits

Balanced::BankAccount.debit

balanced.BankAccount().debit()

balanced.get().debit()

BankAccount().debit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\BankAccount->debits->create();

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA40m4YxkdjWbasw6sWbu79g/debits \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "appears_on_statement_as=Statement text" \
     -d "amount=5000" \
     -d "description=Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6ARjzdSjbnDWFK6ykjuGhy')
bank_account.debit(
  :amount => 5000,
  :appears_on_statement_as => 'Statement text',
  :description => 'Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA50LpPrCTB63Ecm0wEgdOQM')
bank_account.debit(
  appears_on_statement_as='Statement text',
  amount=5000,
  description='Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/bank_accounts/BA40m4YxkdjWbasw6sWbu79g').debit({
    "appears_on_statement_as": "Statement text", 
    "amount": 5000, 
    "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA3EMnkybAfEzVlbVquXFLEk");

HashMap<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 5000);
payload.put("description", "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard");
payload.put("appears_on_statement_as", "Statement text");

try {
    Debit debit = bankAccount.debit(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/bank_accounts/BA2FRIFG3IUSkPZYnFll6g8S");
$bank_account->debits->create(array(
    "amount" => "5000",
    "appears_on_statement_as" => "Statement text",
    "description" => "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard",
));


?>
